item.title: Glossier Appoints New CEO
item.description: The makeup brand that got its start with direct to consumer sales tapped Procter & Gamble and Ouai vet Colin Walsh to lead the company.

item.title: Trump Administration Renews Push to Fire Fed Governor Lisa Cook Ahead of Key Vote
item.description: After a court reinstated Cook as Fed governor, the Trump administration asked for an emergency ruling before an important vote.

item.title: Millions Face Skyrocketing Health Insurance Costs Unless Congress Extends Subsidies
item.description: Health insurance premiums are poised to skyrocket next year, especially if tax credits that made it more affordable expire.

item.title: Trump Administration Unlawfully Directed Mass US Worker Terminations, Judge Rules
item.description: The judge is unable to reinstate jobs because ‘too much has happened since the Supreme Court’s April decision.’

item.title: 7 Powerful Productivity Hacks Every Leader Should Know
item.description: Even leaders at the highest level of performance face the ongoing battle of procrastination.
